publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6608.1 Des McNulty: Action Mesothelioma Day, 2 July 2010—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6608) in the name of Stuart McMillan, after "such as" insert "Clydebank Asbestos Group and". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-6608.1 Action Mesothelioma Day, 2 July 2010 (lodged on 28 June 2010) Karen Gillon*, Cathie Craigie*, Hugh Henry*, Trish Godman*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Johann Lamont*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Jackie Baillie*, Karen Whitefield*, Patricia Ferguson*, David Whitton*, Ken Macintosh*

S3M-6608.1 Des McNulty: Action Mesothelioma Day, 2 July 2010—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6608) in the name of Stuart McMillan, leave out from "Clydeside" to "2008" and insert "Clydebank Asbestos Group and *Clydeside Action on Asbestos that, this National Mesothelioma Day, are hosting the first ever day for patients and carers; acknowledges that the Scottish Parliament has an excellent record of supporting those with asbestos-related conditions, as evidenced by the passing of the Rights of Relatives to Damages (Mesothelioma) (Scotland) Act 2007 and the Damages (Asbestos-related Conditions) (Scotland) Act 2008,*". Supported by: Karen Gillon, Cathie Craigie, Hugh Henry, Trish Godman, Ms Wendy Alexander, Johann Lamont, Mr Frank McAveety, Jackie Baillie, Karen Whitefield, Patricia Ferguson, David Whitton, Ken Macintosh, Pauline McNeill*, John Park*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-6608.1 Action Mesothelioma Day, 2 July 2010 (lodged on 28 June 2010) Cathy Peattie*
